inclusion.criterion: ECG / ECO within the last 6 months
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: older than 18 years and younger than 90 years
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Cases without optimal electro or echocardiographic examination due to limited echogenicity
exclusion.label: triggers

notes: Patient has a history of CAD, recently noted abdominal mass, and presents with fevers/rigors and bandemia. She underwent EUS with biopsy showing pancreatic adenocarcinoma at the head of pancreas.
